logLevel.describe: Logging level (error, warn, info, verbose, debug, silly)

admin.describe: <port> Port for admin portal. Defaults to 8889.

cert.describe: Stubby Argument : <file> Certificate file. Use with --key.

key.describe: Stubby Argument : <file>  Private key file. Use with --cert.

location.describe: Stubby Argument : <hostname> Hostname at which to bind stubby.

quiet.describe: Stubby Argument : Prevent stubby from printing to the console.

pfx.describe: Stubby Argument : <file> PFX file. Ignored if used with --key/--cert

stubs.describe: Stubby Argument : <port> Port for stubs portal. Defaults to 8882.

tls.describe: Stubby Argument : <port> Port for https stubs portal. Defaults to 7443.
